lead_paragraph: Store Sales Here Up 3% Sales of New York and Brooklyn department stores showed an increase of 3 per cent for the week ended Oct. 18, according to the preliminary report issued yesterday by the Federal Reserve Bank of New York.
abstract: Brit needs cut U S space for Middle East
